Text: I´m also a cigar lover and a Canadian (Toronto) living in South America, thanks, don´t go green with envy but I´m buying the Espléndidos here for $ 70 the box of 25 from people who go to Cuba on business or study... Lucky me...
I pay 60$ CDN for 1, here in Quebec :P
Tack så mycket! Muchas gracias! Merci beaucoup! Vielen Dank! La ringrazio molto! Thanks m8!  I often smoke Nicaraguan & Dominican sticks, if you have any other cigar books post them please.
